text: The 2011 Volkswagen Scirocco R-Cup season was the second Volkswagen Scirocco R-Cup season, the replacement for the ADAC Volkswagen Polo Cup. It began on 30 April at the Hockenheimring and concluded at the same venue on 22 October, after eight race weekends and a total of ten races. ==Drivers== * All cars are powered by Volkswagen engines and use Volkswagen Scirocco chassis. {| | {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" ! !
